<sim>.name: Sim
<sim>.info: She is a veteran actress known for her charismatic presence and deep emotional expression. Her warm smile contrasts with her strong, commanding roles on screen.

<sky>.name: Sky
<sky>.info: A charming actor with a youthful vibe, he balances playful charisma with subtle emotional depth. His expressive gestures add charm to every public appearance.

<cho>.name: Cho
<cho>.info: A rising actress with a bright and cheerful aura, she brings energy to the screen and stage alike. Her youthful confidence and style catch the spotlight with ease.

<lee>.name: Lee
<lee>.info: A globally recognized actor, he is renowned for his versatile acting and warm smile. His refined appearance blends intensity with approachability.
